channel.title: Telling a Programmer
channel.description: Attention all programmers! Please up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE!. Screen and MDMP files had been uploaded I don't really remember what level was, I do remember being told that the soldiers had arrived > the level loaded > sentry shot me and two guards > i shot sentry > walked two meters > message pops up telling me to tell programmers "up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE". next time i'll try to crowbar the sentry.. maybe that'll help.. ;D P.S. WHY AM I A COCKROACH?!? Gordon Freeman and nothing else! ![BMSB.jpg|690x500](upload://cj1E1Xirv8NqgvJIPoFoRkTv4Hx.jpeg) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T8_59_44C0.mdmp (112 KB)

item.title: Telling a Programmer
item.dc:creator: skyline
item.description:
Attention all programmers!
Please up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE!.

Screen and MDMP files had been uploaded

I don’t really remember what level was,
I do remember being told that the soldiers had arrived > the level loaded >
sentry shot me and two guards > i shot sentry > walked two meters >
message pops up telling me to tell programmers “up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE”.

next time i’ll try to crowbar the sentry… maybe that’ll help… ;D

P.S. WHY AM I A COCKROACH?!? Gordon Freeman and nothing else!

BMSB.jpg1279×1023 74.8 KB

hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T8_59_44C0.mdmp (112 KB)
